instructions:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly grease 13x9-inch pan. Remove dough from can; unroll into 1 long rectangle in greased pan. Starting at center, press out dough to sides of pan; press perforations to seal.
In medium bowl, combine all remaining ingredients; mix well. Spoon and spread mixture evenly over dough.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 17 to 22 minutes or until filling is set and edges are light golden brown. Cool 5 minutes. Cut into small squares.
ingredients: 1 (4.5 ounce) can Old El Paso® Chopped Green Chiles, drained
title: Chile Cheese Puffs
